duties_responsibilities.duty: Read and interpret 2D fabrication drawings of curtainwall units.
Draft curtainwall units in 3D using Autodesk Inventor.
Drafting in a variety of CAD environments (AutoCAD, Solidworks, Inventor).
Participate in various design training activities.

education_certification.credential: Applicants should be in the process of a degree, or a recent college graduate in Civil, Architectural or Mechanical Engineering field
